gold.user: User requests a list of all cable terminations in the system.
gold.ideal: Returns a JSON array of cable termination objects.

gold.user: User submits a new cable with specifications.
gold.ideal: Returns the created cable object with its details.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve details of a specific device by ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the device object with all its attributes.

gold.user: User updates multiple locations with new data.
gold.ideal: Returns a success message and updated location objects.

gold.user: User wants to delete a specific interface by ID.
gold.ideal: Returns a confirmation message indicating the interface was deleted.

gold.user: User requests a list of all power feeds in the system.
gold.ideal: Returns a JSON array of power feed objects.

gold.user: User updates specific fields of a manufacturer by ID.
User creates a new module with specified attributes.
gold.ideal: Returns the created module object with its details.

gold.user: User updates the details of a specific device type.
gold.ideal: Returns the updated device type object.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve details of a specific inventory item by ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the inventory item object with all its attributes.

gold.user: User requests the trace information for a specific console port.
gold.ideal: Returns the trace data for the specified console port.
